summary.span: 提供用于显示固定内容或流动内容（分别由 或 表示）的查看器的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for viewers that are intended to display fixed or flow content (represented by a or , respectively).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个最小基类，旨在仅提供在文档查看方案中通用的基本功能。 is a minimal base class, intended to provide only basic functionality that is common across document viewing scenarios. 此基类不提供用户界面。This base class provides no user interface.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应将查看器中的子元素用作母版页。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether or not a child element in the viewer should be used as a master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加属性用于指示 集合中的哪个 对象代表母版页。This attached property is used to indicate which in the collection represents master page. 母版页对应于当前处于活动状态 (在查看器中显示) 的页面。The master page corresponds to the page that is currently active (being displayed) in the viewer. 通常，集合中不能有多个成员 标记为母版页。Typically, no more than one member of the collection is marked as the master page. 如果集合中有多个成员 标记为母版页，则会为逻辑树中指定的第一个成员（ (深度优先) 指定为活动主机）。If more than one member of the collection is marked as the master page, then the first indicated in the logical tree (depth-first) is designated the active master. 如果集合中没有任何成员 标记为母版页，则母版页默认为集合的第一个成员 。If no members of the collection are marked as the master page, then the master page defaults to the first member of the collection. 使用 方法设置此属性，并将其附加到 (依赖对象) 的指定元素。Use the method to set and attach this property to a specified element (dependency object). 使用 方法从指定的元素读取此附加属性的值。Use the method to read the value of this attached property from a specified element. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

value.span: 当前文档中的页数，如果当前没有加载任何文档，则为 **0** 。

span.span: The number of pages in the current document, or **0** if no document is currently loaded.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对内容进行分页时，将更新此值。This value is updated as content is paginated. 由于流内容没有固定页面的概念，因此，如果调整了查看器的大小，或修改了要显示的内容，则此属性的值可能会更改。Because flow content has no notion of fixed pages, the value of this property may change if the viewer is resized, or if the content being displayed is modified. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供由基础) 表示的特定内容页 (的视区 。A provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying ). 查看器使用属性表示的对象集来显示内容。The set of objects represented by the property is used by the viewer in order to display content. 母版页对应于 集合) 中的对象 ( ，其中包含 值为的附加属性 `true` 。The master page corresponds to the object (in the collection) that includes the attached property with a value of `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 调用标准的“打印”对话框，此对话框可用于打印查看器的内容和配置打印首选项\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the viewer and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了标准 **打印** 对话框的示例。The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog. 请注意，" **打印** " 对话框的特定外观可能因宿主计算机的配置而异。Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![屏幕快照：“打印”对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕快照：“打印”对话框")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
